detail_desc: Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Bell-shaped skirt in soft imitation leather with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Jacket in a cotton weave with a flounce at the front. Detachable, lined hood, small stand-up collar, zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist, decorative ring at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Jacket and joggers in soft fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and frills at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and frilled hems.
Short, wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, long sleeves with scalloped trims, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved jersey dress with a deep V-neck, decorative knot at the front and seam at the waist. Lined.
Ankle-length joggers in stretch, denim-look twill with a high, elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets, and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave. Lined.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. 5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with print motifs. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and pockets in the side seams.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Shorts in washed denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Push up shaping – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with a silicone trim and plastic stays at the top for support and narrow, detachable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and short legs.
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that double and cross at the back. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and a dungaree dress in soft cotton. Top in jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with a chest pocket, elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Unlined.
Pinstriped shirt in a woven wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Top in jersey made from recycled polyester with a boat neck and short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Sturdy hat in braided paper straw with a flat crown. Band in an airy weave around half the hat that continues down through the sides to form ties that can be fastened in various ways. Width of brim 7.5 cm.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in slightly stretchy leather. Fitted at the top with a regular waist and chunky zip in one side. Flared legs with raw-edge hems. Unlined.
Jeans in washed cotton denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Car coat in woven fabric with a water-repellent finish. Collar, press-studs down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined with taped seams inside. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.

Playsuit in an airy linen and viscose blend that can be worn with or without shoulder straps. Wide flounce at the top with a concealed silicone trim, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Concealed zip in one side and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Lined.

prod_name: Func. Hector pile HT WP SB
detail_desc: Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top, and a loop front and back. Faux shearling linings and chunky, patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Suede loafers with a decorative seam at the front and soft heel caps so they can be worn as slip-ons. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Gently tapered waist with a detachable tie belt and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Voluminous blouse in a textured silk weave with a gathered stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Wide raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an asymmetric hem.
Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned fabric with a round neck and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shoulder bag in imitation suede with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a flap with a magnetic fastener. Three inner compartments, one with a zip and one inner pocket. Lined. Size 8x16x23 cm.
Suede sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Knee-length dress in slightly stretchy cotton satin with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with narrow ties. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Voluminous blouse in voile made from recycled cotton with a high, wrapover collar with a concealed fastening and decorative seams. Gathered neckline with a drawstring and a concealed opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders and wide, tapered sleeves with narrow, double-buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut top in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck and asymmetric butterfly sleeves.
